allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: comprehensive testing fixes and role-based access control

Backend:
- Add RBAC dependency functions \(get_current_admin_user, get_current_manager_or_above, get_current_dispatcher_or_above\)
- Secure sensitive endpoints with proper role checks
- Add warehouse CRUD endpoints with admin-only access
- Add driver and user delete endpoints with safeguards
- Fix notification route ordering \(register-device before /{id}\)
- Remove unreachable dead code in orders.py
- Register WebSocket router in api.py
- Fix test assertions for refresh token, driver create, order import

Frontend:
- Fix MSW handlers for /auth/refresh, /users/me, /drivers/online
- Update test assertions for axios error format
- Fix lucide-react mock to include Download icon
- Fix driverService test parameter expectations
- Fix LoginPage and authService test mocks

Mobile \(Flutter\):
- Fix all 84 lint warnings \(0 issues remaining\)
- Update deprecated withOpacity to withValues\(alpha:\)
- Update deprecated Radio API to RadioGroup widget
- Change print\(\) to debugPrint\(\)
- Fix control body formatting
- Add OrderStatusUpdateRequested event with POD upload
- Fix ConnectivityResult type handling
- Change Order to OrderModel throughout
- Generate location_model.g.dart

Test Results:
- Backend: 123/123 unit tests pass
- Frontend: 257/257 tests pass
- Flutter: 0 lint issues

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: update mobile app API URL to production

Changed API base URL from local emulator \(10.0.2.2:8000\) to production
\(pharmafleet-olive.vercel.app\). This was causing "invalid credentials"
errors on real devices.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
